manifest.name: Custom Selected Word Count
manifest.description: Comprehensive text analysis for selected text including word counting, character counting, and sentence counting with modern UI design.
manifest.author: banisterious

data.manifestValue: Comprehensive text analysis for selected text including word counting, character counting, and sentence counting with modern UI design.
data.communityListValue: Provides advanced word counting features for selected text across all view modes. Goes beyond basic word counting with customizable path exclusion, and more.
